            Bio
            Shuo Wang studies agricultural and resource economics at the University of Maryland. Her research focuses on how climate change would affect the vulnerable groups.
            
            
            Education
            University of Maryland | College Park, MD
            Ph.D. in Agricultural and Resource Economics | August 2021 - June 2026
            University of Alberta | Edmonton, AB
            M.Sc. in Agricultural and Resource Economics | September 2016 - Nov 2018
            University of Alberta | Edmonton, AB
            B.Sc. in Environmental and Economic Policy | September 2013 - Jun 2016
            
            
            Experience
            Chinese Academy of Financial Inclusion | Associate Researcher | May 2019 - Jun 2021
            usethis::use_git_remote(“origin”, url = NULL, overwrite = TRUE) usethis::use_github()
            32
